蓬佩奥对华仇恨的根底已来由久。

其父叫覃國卿，湖南张家界人，当時是当地最大恶霸地主。其爷爷红軍時期因与人民为敌，被苏维埃政府镇压，其父覃國卿与其三叔一起逃亡上山为匪，其间与人民为敌，烧杀抢掠，无恶不做。后因与其叔二姨太勾搭成奸被其叔发现，杀死其叔，霸占其叔二姨太(后又抢青年学生田玉莲为其妻)。

其父覃國卿1965年3月24日在湖南青安坪地区被解放軍剿匪部队击毙(中國大陆最后一个土匪)。其生母田玉莲被活捉，后经人民政府审讯后枪毙。

蓬佩奥其人原名叫覃玉奥，是覃國卿与田玉莲1963年12月30日在湘西乌龙山地区所生。

Exclusive - Manchester City are considering making a move for Brentford goalkeeper David Raya as Pep Guardiola looks to bring in a replacement for the departing Claudio Bravo. However, they may face competition for his signature from Premier League rivals Arsenal.

24-year-old Raya only joined Brentford last summer for around £3m, but he has been crucial in the Bees' promotion push this season. The shot-stopper has played every minute of Championship football in 2019/20, keeping 16 clean sheets in this time - placing him at the top of the list in this department along with Millwall's Bartosz Bialkowski.

The 24-year-old's stellar performances this campaign haven't gone unnoticed either. A source has confirmed to 90min that Manchester City are looking at Raya as Guardiola looks to bring in a replacement for Bravo - who is set to leave the Etihad for free once the 2019/20 season is complete.

Ederson is City's undisputed number one, but Guardiola is keen to bring in a shot-stopper who can challenge the Brazilian and push him on. 90min has learned that Brentford could allow Raya to leave the club if an offer of around £10m were to come in - a deal which would see them more than triple their original investment.

However, City aren't the only top Premier League club considering a move for Raya as Arsenal have also been interested.

Despite Emiliano Martinez's impressive performances in recent weeks, Mikel Arteta's goalkeeping coach Iñaki Caña Pavon has highlighted Raya as the number one target for this position should Arteta wish to strengthen.

Of course, Martinez has hardly put a foot wrong in Bernd Leno's absence, negating the immediate need for goalkeeping reinforcements.

However, at 27 and with only 35 senior appearances for the Gunners to his name, Martinez could yet push for first-team football elsewhere off the back of his recent form.

Arteta will be looking to strengthen this summer in a number of areas, and 90min recently learned that the north Londoners are considering a move for Aston Villa's Douglas Luiz.

【Now Sports】阿仙奴新星薩卡正在考慮，應該代表英格蘭還是尼日利亞出戰國際賽。

18歲的薩卡（Bukayo Saka）在英國倫敦出生，父母來自尼日利亞，因此具有資格代表這2個國家。他於小國腳層面上，曾為三獅兵團U16、U17、U18、U19披甲。

根據英國《太陽報》報道，尼日利亞足總正努力游說薩卡穿上超霸鷹球衣，但這名翼衛仍然未作出決定。他表示：「這是一個艱難的選擇。我很高興能夠代表英格蘭征戰青年賽事，但同時為父母的尼日利亞血統感到驕傲。我還沒有被任何球隊選中，所以要保持謙虛，到時候便會做出决定。」

尼日利亞足總早前也希望車路士射手艾巴咸來投，但22歲的他其後發出聲明效忠英格蘭，至今上陣4場入1球。

圖片來源 : ©AFP
